Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.EXPLANATION: The average time between equipment failures.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.FORMULA: Total Operating Time / Number of Failures

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.EXPLANATION: The average time required to repair a failed system or component.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.FORMULA: Total Repair Time / Number of Repairs

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.EXPLANATION: The average cost incurred for maintenance per unit produced.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.FORMULA: Total Maintenance Cost / Total Units Produced

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of scheduled maintenance activities completed on time.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.FORMULA: (Number of Completed Scheduled Maintenance Activities / Total Scheduled Maintenance Activities) * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.EXPLANATION: The total time that equipment is not operational due to maintenance or repairs.
The ratio of maintenance work completed to the resources used for maintenance tasks.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.FORMULA: (Maintenance Work Completed / Total Maintenance Hours Worked)

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.EXPLANATION: The percentage of preventive maintenance tasks completed on schedule.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.FORMULA: (Number of Preventive Maintenance Activities Completed / Total Preventive Maintenance Activities Scheduled) * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.EXPLANATION: The rate at which spare parts inventory is used and replenished over a specific period.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Maintenance.FORMULA: Cost of Spare Parts Used / Average Spare Parts Inventory
